messages.introduction: Hello, welcome to this Skujies bot. Click on /enroll to register and pay for tutorials in courses of your choice.
messages.enroll: Please select the courses you will like to recieve tutorials on. Please click on as many courses you will like to pay for.
messages.payment_prompt: When you are done selecting courses, click on /payNow to make payments.
messages.course_selected_error: You have selected this course previously. Please select another course.
messages.course_list:
{} . This is the list of courses you have registered for.
Please Click /enroll if this is wrong or you want to add more courses.
messages.email_prompt:
Please enter your valid email address.

This is the address your payment receipt will be sent to
messages.payment_url_response: Please click on this link {} to make payment for this month. **Please do not use this same link to make payments for another month.**
